alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fond du Lac; Sheboygan (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 18 at 6:22PM CST until February 18 at 7:15PM CST by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Fond du Lac County in east central Wisconsin... Northeastern Dodge County in southeastern Wisconsin... Sheboygan County in east central Wisconsin... * Until 715 PM CST. * At 621 PM CST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from Northern Lake Winnebago to 7 miles southwest of Markesan, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Poor visibility in heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes the following highways... Interstates 41 and 43. Locations impacted include... Sheboygan, Fond Du Lac, Plymouth, Sheboygan Falls, North Fond Du Lac, Howards Grove, Oostburg, Lomira, Kohler, Cedar Grove, Campbellsport, Random Lake, Oakfield, Elkhart Lake, Southern Lake Winnebago, Taycheedah, Ashford, Lamartine, Byron and Greenbush. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.
